title: France : number of public primary schools 2005 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of public schools. In total the number of data points it has is 13.
In general Number of public schools has fallen over the Year.
Number of public schools is slightly decreasing from 2005 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2005 and 2007.
The highest Number of public schools, of value 50668.0 was reached at Year 2005
Minimum Number of public schools about 44902.0 was reached at Year 2018
